title: Can I write a book against Mahatma Gandhi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes,of course , you can write a book against Mahatma Gandhi. Many people have written against him so nothing to worry. But it's better to write what is right. Please avoid the false stories which you have heard from hear and there. You should not believe on Whatsapp stories. You will have to read many books especially written by his contemporaries like Nehru, Subhaah Chander Bose or Savarkar or any other historian of that time. That will be equal to first hand experience. If you read a writer of present time writer that will not be as fruitful to you. He might be biased against or for the person. Study hard and write as a neutral person . You can be a successful writer. If you have hate Gandhi and write against him and want to throw out your hate , you can but of no use . You will not be considered a wise and geniune person. Gandhi was a man afterall. He may have many weaknesses. So you can find his weaknesses. But you have to read the whole literature. Because many written on Gandhi some of the people who wrote against him to get name and fame. But you should be judicious in criticism. Your criticism be based on solid ground. Good luck.

Why not but just writing a book is not enough. One should have authentic records n statements to make the part of the book. Just ear dropping words n stores will have reverse effect. So far any writer or biographer avoid negative sides of life. It is particularly corruption made during political life, lose character act etc never become the part of the book but time to time some close associate or people who had the opportunity to watch the person closely have mention in their books n writings. If some have enough authentic information can pen it in form of book or articles. I do not think there is any challange.

You can write any thing in this country as per your views and ideas…the only thing required is that you should have a detailed knowledge of the topic and clear views on the topic whether it be a topic on gandhi or any other leader…By the way there are already some books in the market…which never became so much popular or might have been banned..or something like that…i dont have idea about those books in detail… By the way..if you want to write than this is the right time because the country is being ruled by some people who are not a big fan of the Gandhi(s)😝…so they wont take any political action against you..which, in case congress would have ruled, you might had faced

Yes. You will be completing the left over job of Maulana Azad, Maulana Muhammad Ali, Maulana Shaukat Ali, Allama Iqbal, Motilal Nehru and many others. In other words you will be reviving Khalifayat ideology.
